TitleEnglish: Crayon Shin-chan: Burst Serving! Kung Fu Boys ~Ramen Rebellion~
SummaryEnglish: In this movie, Shin-chan is all set to challenge Kung Fu in the Chinatown of Kasukabe city, known as "AiyƒÅ Town". Shinnosuke and the Kasukabe Defence Force are going to put up a totally no-stunt Kung Fu challenge on the stage.
